page.title: 02ASHCOMBE FARM
page.content: Ashcombe Farm is situated in Kingston near Lewes (3809).It is owned by Mr.Rea. Ashcombe Farm has an area of 735 acres,he also owns other land ,in Pevensey Marshes,with an area of 135 acres.He keeps 1 Charolais bull,1 Hereford bull,a flock of fat sheep and a herd of beef cattle.Both of these are sold at Lewes Cattle Market.The corn is transported to Shoreham by road and then exported.The main pieces of machinery on the farm are,John Deer Harvesters,Baledroppers and tractors. The financial business is handled by Mr.Rea,he has three employees and two sons who help him on the farm. Mr.Rea,did not inherit the farm but bought it when he got married,he hopes that one day one of his sons will inherit the farm.
